entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
